HotelElement.Name: Kettering Park Hotel and Spa - Part of the Shire Hotels Group

Description.Text: At the Kettering Park Hotel & Spa the hotel is proud of the four-star approach to everything the hotel does and the hotel is confident you won't find a warmer reception anywhere in the East Midlands. The hotel is delighted also that as well as the first class spa facilities the hotel now offer spa treatments too, perfect for that get away break, or girls night away...! The hard part is deciding whether to go for the burn or to simply indulge. Whether you're here to work, rest or play, the stylish contemporary guest rooms, award winning dining options and complimentary Spa facilities will help to make your stay with the hotel that little bit more special. The hotel takes your comfort and well-being very seriously - but it doesn't mean the hotel does not want you to enjoy yourself at the same time. Which is why you have complimentary membership of the Spa during your stay with the hotel. Run, step or stretch those muscles with a pulse-pumping workout in the well-equipped gym. But if endorphin rushes arent for you, you can always retreat to the whirlpool or steam room - a much gentler way to refresh your mind and body.

Northamptonshire was made for families and for enjoying time away from home with huge outdoor parks and trails on offer for all ages. And with a super-fast 55 minute connection to London, you can hop on a train and be in the capital city before you know it - well worth remembering for Summer 2012 when the hotel hosting The Olympics. Motorsports are a year round feature for the hotel with Silverstone and Rockingham Circuits both close by. Find out more with the what's on guide.

DOUBLE - ROOM - Double Room offers one double bed or two twin beds. Fresh milk - delivered daily to every room. The hotel knows it's only a little thing - but it's one that everyone appreciates. You'll find your guest room has lots of these thoughtful touches - like complimentary mineral water, fresh ground coffee & a great tea selection, free WiFi internet access and a complimentary newspaper. And it goes without saying, a stylish, contemporary decor and a great bed for a good night's sleep.
EXECUTIVE - ROOM - Executive Room offers one double bed or two twin beds. All of the Executive rooms include the following facilities: Work desk with good lighting and power points, Separate seating area with coffee table and sofa/easy chair, Guest fridge with complimentary mineral water and fresh milk, Satellite colour television, Radio or TV alarm clock, Hairdryer, Trouser press, Direct dial telephone, WiFi internet access - free of charge to all hotel residents, Tea and coffee making facilities, Air conditioning, En suite bathroom with complimentary Pecksniffs toiletries and Luxury bathrobes.
